documents.title: Soft Skills Overview
documents.content: Soft skills improve communication, productivity, teamwork, and customer experience. Genie helps employees learn daily communication, clarity, confidence, listening, empathy, and problem-solving.

documents.title: Communication Basics
documents.content: All employees must follow: speak clearly, use short sentences, avoid assumptions, ask clarifying questions, respond politely, and keep conversation structured. Never sound rude, confused, or unprepared.

documents.title: Professional Tone Rules
documents.content: Tone must remain polite, confident, and supportive. Avoid slang, anger, sarcasm or too casual language. Written messages must be clear, grammar-correct, and action-focused.

documents.title: Active Listening Skills
documents.content: Employees should listen fully, avoid interrupting, confirm understanding, repeat back key points, and ask structured follow-up questions. Genie coaches employees to improve listening style.

documents.title: Customer Empathy Rules
documents.content: Empathy means understanding the customer's feelings and needs. Employees must acknowledge concerns, show understanding, avoid blame, and provide solutions calmly.

documents.title: Problem Solving Framework
documents.content: Genie provides: 1) Identify the issue, 2) Confirm understanding, 3) Suggest solutions, 4) Explain benefits, 5) Close with reassurance. This framework reduces confusion and increases productivity.

documents.title: Time Management Skills
documents.content: Employees must prioritise tasks, avoid multitasking, block work time, reduce distractions, update CRM on time, fulfil deadlines, and maintain discipline. Genie creates structured day plans.

documents.title: Stress Management Guidance
documents.content: Genie supports employees with calming techniques, positive reminders, micro-break suggestions, and supportive messages. Mistakes are learning opportunities, not failures.
